title: Film Theory: How To SURVIVE Saw!
author: The Film Theorists
description:
Special thanks to Shudder for sponsoring this episode!
Get Shudder FREE for 30 days w/ code filmtheory ► https://www.shudder.com/ 

Get Your BRAND NEW Food Theory Merch NOW! ► https://bit.ly/3vtguU0

Do you think you could SURVIVE a Saw movie? It seems like a logical question to have after witnessing the horror Jigsaw brings to people who are, arguably, just like us. Well Theorists, your buddy MatPat is here to help you do just that. This is not your average "how to beat every trap in Saw" kind of video. I am going to teach you the TRUE way to not die in a Saw movie. That's a good deed worthy of keeping me off Jigsaw's radar, right? Right?!

Get yourself some Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/3vtguU0
Don't miss a Film Theory! ► http://bit.ly/1dI8VBH

ソウ」の映画を見て、生き残れると思いますか？ジグソウが私たちと同じような人々にもたらす恐怖を目の当たりにした後では、それは論理的な質問のように思えます。さて、Theoristsの皆さん、あなたの相棒MatPatがあなたを助けるためにここにいます。このビデオは、「ソウのすべてのトラップを倒す方法」というような、普通のビデオではありません。ソウ映画で死なないための真の方法を教えます。これはジグソウのレーダーから逃れるのに値する善行だよね？だろ？
